magicItems.name: Terms & Conditions Shroud
magicItems.description: A sleek, flexible mantle threaded with micro-projectors. When active, fine print shimmers across your surface like starlit contracts.

features.name: Charges & Risk
features.description: Holds **5 charges**; regains **1d4+1** at dawn. When you roll a **natural 1** while using any feature of this item, you take **1d6 psychic** damage and the Shroud goes **offline until the end of your next turn**.

features.name: Arbitration Field (2 charges)
features.description: Action. Create a **15-foot-radius** zone centered on you for **1 minute**. Creatures that enter or start their turn in the zone make a **Charisma** saving throw against your spell save DC; on a failure, they are affected as by *zone of truth* **while in the area**.

features.name: Clause Binding (no charge; passive while the Field is active)
features.description: A creature **inside the Arbitration Field** that **willingly speaks** a promise of **25 words or fewer** becomes **Bound** for **7 days**. If it later **knowingly** breaks that promise, you may use a **Reaction (once per creature per clause)**:  * If the creature is within **60 feet**, it takes **3d8 psychic** damage and **can’t take reactions** until your next turn.  * If it’s farther away, you immediately learn its **general direction** and **approximate distance** (mile-scale ping).

features.name: Corporate Override (1 charge)
features.description: Reaction. When an ally within **30 feet** fails an **ability** or **tool** check by **3 or less**, it **succeeds** instead.

features.name: Complaint Resolution (1 charge)
features.description: Reaction. When a visible creature within **60 feet** **breaches an agreement** made with you today (verbal or written), it makes a **Wisdom** saving throw. On a failure, it takes **3d8 psychic** damage and **can’t take reactions** until the start of your next turn. On a success, it has **disadvantage** on its next action against you.

magicItems.name: Sleeve of Assemblers
magicItems.description: A forearm sheath studded with micro-fabricators and retractable printheads.

features.name: Attunement & Charges
features.description: Holds **4 charges**; regains all charges after a **long rest**. On any **natural 1** while using a feature of this item, you take **1d6 fire** damage and the Sleeve goes **offline until the end of your next turn**.

features.name:
Actions (1 charge each unless noted):**  
 **Keygrow
features.description: Print a one-use **bypass pick** keyed to a specific lock/panel. You have **advantage on the next check** to open/override it within **1 minute**; the tool **dissolves on success**.    **Surface Forge.** **Manifest** a **simple tool** or **simple weapon** (counts as **magical**) for **1 minute** or until dropped.    **Skin-Stitch.** **Stabilize** a creature and set it to **1 HP**; **constructs** instead regain **2d6 HP**.    **Thread-the-Needle (Bonus Action).** This turn, you have **advantage** on **one** **Dexterity (Sleight of Hand)** or **tool** check to tinker/hack.    **Soft Shutdown.** Choose a **non-sentient machine** (camera, turret, door motor, drone) you can see within **30 ft**. It must succeed on a **DC 14 Constitution save** or **power-cycle off** for **1 minute** (ends if it takes damage). **On a success**, it has **disadvantage on its next action/check**.
